00012 // this distinguishes whether we're only looking for patients healable THIS HOUR (those that have been on their assignment
00013 // long enough), or those that will be healable EVER (regardless of whether they're getting healed during this hour)
00014 #define HEALABLE_EVER                     0
00015 #define HEALABLE_THIS_HOUR    1
